PS_decr_1 = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (a : nat -> V) (n : nat) => a (S n) : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), (nat -> V) -> nat -> V Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope nat_scope]
PSeries_plus : forall (a b : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> ex_pseries b x -> PSeries (PS_plus a b) x = PSeries a x + PSeries b x
